text: Bécassine is a 1940 French comedy film directed by Pierre Caron and starring Max Dearly, Paulette Dubost and Marguerite Deval. It is an adaptation of the French comic series Bécassine. ==Cast== * Paulette Dubost - Bécassine * Max Dearly - Monsieur Proey-Minans * Marguerite Deval - Madame Tampico * Marcel Vallée - L'oncle * Annie France - Annie de Grand-Air * Alice Tissot - La marquise de Grand-Air * Nita Raya - Arlette * Daniel Clérice - José Tampico ==See also== *Bécassine (2018) ==External links== * Category:1940 films Category:French films Category:1940 comedy films Category:French-language films Category:Films based on French comics Category:Films directed by Pierre Caron Category:Live-action films based on comics Category:French black-and- white films Category:French comedy films
title: Bécassine (1940 film)
